GlobalValueSet.description: *Lead: Transient state when record is first created *Verified(Lead): Has filled out basic profile information and have verified mobile number and email Registered: Are in the system as a potential donor and SFDC user Applicant: Has an appointment to assess their fitness for donation Eligible: Has met all criteria for donation and Eligiblity datetime is today or in the past Deferred: Has met all critieria for donation and Eligibility datetime is in the future Excluded: Can never* give plasma for various reasons that are PHI
